field.name: budget
field.domain: self.statusSelect = 2 and self.budgetLineList IS NOT EMPTY

attribute.name: domain
attribute.expr: eval:"self.parentBudgetLevel IS NOT NULL AND self.parentBudgetLevel.parentBudgetLevel IS NULL AND self.parentBudgetLevel.budgetTypeSelect in (1,4) AND self.parentBudgetLevel.id = ${global?.id} AND self.statusSelect = 'valid'"

attribute.name: domain
attribute.expr: eval:"self.parentBudgetLevel IS NOT NULL AND self.parentBudgetLevel.parentBudgetLevel IS NULL AND self.parentBudgetLevel.budgetTypeSelect in (3,4) AND self.parentBudgetLevel.id = ${global?.id} AND self.statusSelect = 'valid'"

attribute.name: domain
attribute.expr: eval:"self.parentBudgetLevel IS NOT NULL AND self.parentBudgetLevel.parentBudgetLevel IS NULL AND self.parentBudgetLevel.budgetTypeSelect in (1,4) AND self.statusSelect = 'valid' AND self.parentBudgetLevel.company.id = ${_parent?.company?.id}"

attribute.name: domain
attribute.expr: eval:"self.parentBudgetLevel IS NOT NULL AND self.parentBudgetLevel.parentBudgetLevel IS NULL AND self.parentBudgetLevel.budgetTypeSelect in (3,4) AND self.statusSelect = 'valid' AND self.parentBudgetLevel.company.id = ${_parent?.company?.id}"

attribute.name: domain
attribute.expr: eval:"self.parentBudgetLevel IS NOT NULL AND self.parentBudgetLevel.parentBudgetLevel IS NULL AND self.parentBudgetLevel.budgetTypeSelect in (1,4) AND self.statusSelect = 'valid'"

attribute.name: domain
attribute.expr: eval:"self.parentBudgetLevel IS NOT NULL AND self.parentBudgetLevel.parentBudgetLevel IS NULL AND self.parentBudgetLevel.budgetTypeSelect in (3,4) AND self.statusSelect = 'valid'"

attribute.name: domain
attribute.expr: eval: self.id = 0

attribute.name: domain
attribute.expr: eval: "self.parentBudgetLevel IS NOT NULL AND self.parentBudgetLevel.parentBudgetLevel.budgetTypeSelect in (1,4) AND self.parentBudgetLevel.id = ${groupBudget?.id} AND self.statusSelect = 'valid' "

attribute.expr: eval: "self.parentBudgetLevel IS NOT NULL AND self.parentBudgetLevel.parentBudgetLevel.budgetTypeSelect in (3,4) AND self.parentBudgetLevel.id = ${groupBudget?.id} AND self.statusSelect = 'valid' "

attribute.name: domain
attribute.expr: eval: "self.parentBudgetLevel IS NOT NULL AND self.parentBudgetLevel.parentBudgetLevel.budgetTypeSelect in (1,4) AND self.parentBudgetLevel.parentBudgetLevel.id = ${__parent__?.budgetLevel?.id} AND self.statusSelect = 'valid' "

attribute.expr: eval: "self.parentBudgetLevel IS NOT NULL AND self.parentBudgetLevel.parentBudgetLevel.budgetTypeSelect in (3,4) AND self.parentBudgetLevel.parentBudgetLevel.id = ${__parent__?.budgetLevel?.id} AND self.statusSelect = 'valid' "

attribute.name: domain
attribute.expr: eval: self.id = 0

attribute.name: domain
attribute.expr: eval:"self.budgetLevel.parentBudgetLevel.parentBudgetLevel IS NOT NULL AND ((${account.accountType.technicalTypeSelect} = 'charge' AND self.budgetLevel.parentBudgetLevel.parentBudgetLevel.budgetTypeSelect in (1,4)) OR (${account.accountType.technicalTypeSelect} = 'immobilisation' AND self.budgetLevel.parentBudgetLevel.parentBudgetLevel.budgetTypeSelect in (3,4))) AND self.budgetLevel.id = ${section?.id}"

attribute.name: domain
attribute.expr: eval:"self.budgetLevel.parentBudgetLevel.parentBudgetLevel IS NOT NULL AND ((${account.accountType.technicalTypeSelect} = 'charge' AND self.budgetLevel.parentBudgetLevel.parentBudgetLevel.budgetTypeSelect in (1,4)) OR (${account.accountType.technicalTypeSelect} = 'immobilisation' AND self.budgetLevel.parentBudgetLevel.parentBudgetLevel.budgetTypeSelect in (3,4))) AND self.budgetLevel.parentBudgetLevel.id = ${groupBudget?.id}"

attribute.name: domain
attribute.expr: eval:"self.budgetLevel.parentBudgetLevel.parentBudgetLevel IS NOT NULL AND ((${account.accountType.technicalTypeSelect} = 'charge' AND self.budgetLevel.parentBudgetLevel.parentBudgetLevel.budgetTypeSelect in (1,4)) OR (${account.accountType.technicalTypeSelect} = 'immobilisation' AND self.budgetLevel.parentBudgetLevel.parentBudgetLevel.budgetTypeSelect in (3,4))) AND self.budgetLevel.parentBudgetLevel.parentBudgetLevel.id = ${global?.id}"

attribute.name: domain
attribute.expr: eval: self.budgetLevel.parentBudgetLevel.parentBudgetLevel IS NOT NULL AND ((${account.accountType.technicalTypeSelect} = 'charge' AND self.budgetLevel.parentBudgetLevel.parentBudgetLevel.budgetTypeSelect in (1,4)) OR (${account.accountType.technicalTypeSelect} = 'immobilisation' AND self.budgetLevel.parentBudgetLevel.parentBudgetLevel.budgetTypeSelect in (3,4))) AND self.budgetLevel.parentBudgetLevel.parentBudgetLevel.company.id = ${_parent?.company?.id}

attribute.name: domain
attribute.expr: eval: self.budgetLevel.parentBudgetLevel.parentBudgetLevel IS NOT NULL AND ((${account.accountType.technicalTypeSelect} = 'charge' AND self.budgetLevel.parentBudgetLevel.parentBudgetLevel.budgetTypeSelect in (1,4)) OR (${account.accountType.technicalTypeSelect} = 'immobilisation' AND self.budgetLevel.parentBudgetLevel.parentBudgetLevel.budgetTypeSelect in (3,4)))

attribute.name: domain
attribute.expr: eval: self.id = 0
